getDistance

从类 SequenceFragmentMetric 复制的描述

getWeightMatrix

public WeightMatrix getWeightMatrix()
覆盖：
类 SequenceFragmentMetric 中的 getWeightMatrix
返回：
the WeightMatrix used when computing the distance between two fragments using this metric.
